name: Tegridy Puzzles
description:
Tegridy Puzzles is a simple Jigsaw Puzzle Game designed for relaxing. Great for road trips or just killing time.
Solve puzzles and earn achievements!

Key Features:
1. 35 Unique Puzzles!
2. Unlock System!
3. Steam achievements!
4. Unique Artwork!
5. Various Art Types Such As Drawings, Fractals, Paintings, Flat Design, And Photography Is Used.
